Title: Relates to certificates of registration for entities that manufacture or assemble zero emissions vehicles
Summary: Relates to certificates of registration for entities that manufacture or assemble zero emissions vehicles; authorizes 20 certificates with at least five to be located in certain upstate regions.
LawCode: Amd ยง415, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to certificates of registration for entities that manufacture or assemble zero emissions vehicles
